Package app.mines

Class StatusBar

java.lang.Object
app.mines.StatusBar
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class StatusBar extends Object implements Runnable
The status bar that appears below the game window

  • Constructor Details

    • StatusBar

      public StatusBar(Minesweeper game, int numMines, int best)
      Creates a StatusBar with the given information and adds it to the game's window
      Parameters:
      game - The Minesweeper instance the StatusBar belongs to
      numMines - The number of mines on the board
      best - The previous best time for the game's board

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      Called when the thread is started. Displays the current time and mine count
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable

    • startTimer

      public void startTimer()
      Sets the game start time

    • stopTimer

      public int stopTimer()
      Flags the thread to stop and finds the final time
      Returns:
      The game duration when the timer was stopped

    • update

      public void update()
      Wakes the thread to update the status bar's text
